评论详情: Very nice quality, true to size, good pricing, worth the buy.
Ordered a small based on the measurement of my waist (28 inches) and they came in a size that was almost a zero. If you order these go at least 2 sizes up.
It has the right size and looks just like the picture. It came fast, it came in 3 days. Nothing was wrong with it, it was in good shape when it came.
They run small. Ordered for a 14 more size 10. Good quality and decent graffiti just sized wrong.
